name: Get Bready
description:
My first ever game with Unity. Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move the duck around and collect bread. But if you get pooed on the game is over!

//Unfortunately, on conversion to WebGL build (or import/export of scene), some assets and scripting have been removed and the view is more zoomed in that it should be - fullscreen mostly fixes this. These are fixed in the Windows version which is attached.

//I previously fixed the issue of the duck spinning on the spot by increasing angular drag, however, I undid this because it seems quite comical.
